name: IaiJets
description:
IaiJets - Survive as long as you can jetting around the skies of Japan as a Feudal Rōnin with nothing but his old, faithful sword and some futuristic leg jets.

Controls:

Hold Left Mouse to charge up your leg jets. Release the mouse to shoot towards your cursor.

Programmed in Unity.

Graphics made in GIMP.

Music and SFX produced in Studio One 3 and edited in Audacity.
